description: BL9 chunk
BL9 chunk MK ii
Remains of BL9 that took a form of a blade-like tendril, it's possible to craft BL9-tendril sword with this
Remains of BL9 that took a form of a stretching worm-like organism, it's possible to craft BL9-worm whip with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of broken mechanical claws, it's possible to craft BL9-infused claws with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of Repto's giant claw, it's possible to craft BL9 Repto spear with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spindly spiked parasitem, it's possible to craft BL9-spike sword with this
Remains of BL9 Assassin's samples infused with his sharp tail, it's possible to craft BL9 tail whip with this
Remains of BL9 Twisted One's samples infused with whatever is left of his tentacles, it's possible to craft BL9-tentacle axe with this
Remains of BL9 tentacles samples that took a form of a sharp blade, it's possible to craft BL9 bladed tentacle claws with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spiked worm-like parasite, it's possible to craft BL9-worm spiked polearm with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spiked tentacle, it's possible to craft BL9-tentacle spiked flail with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of evolved Repto's astoundingly enormous claw, it's possible to craft BL9 evolved Repto spear with this
Remains of BL9 Chimera's samples that took a form of a deadly mouth with a giant pincer, it's possible to craft BL9-pincer sword with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of huge fan-like claws, it's possible to craft BL9 evolved claws with this
Remains of BL9 Vile One's samples that took a form of a giant spiked crustacean leg, it's possible to craft BL9 spiked sledgehammer with this

An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly feel how it's vibrating, moving more wildly than the ordinary samples, it seems like common samples around it move and act in accordance with the 'waves' that it sends to them, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

Incredible technologically advanced relatively small device which is capable of generating an energy shield around itself of a massive size. Currently turned off with only way of turning it on known to exile Davranide scientist that you are likely to be acquainted with already from journals which you can read. Exile Davranide scientist has programmed BL9 Safety Bases Android system to be able to turn shield generator on because he himself has created this shield generator

Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL. Long-time survivors, we are in need of your help. This map contains locations of BL9 Safety Bases, where you need to go to receive further instructions. All explanations will be provided to you by one of our Base Androids or via printed intel along with journals, which can be found in BL9 Safety Bases, BL9 Libraries, BL9 Bookstores. If you want to help us, go to one of BL9 Safety Bases, where you need to talk to one of our Base Androids to receive further instructions

use_action.message: You carefully examine the map and spot the entrances of BL9 Safety Bases hopefully

name.str: BL9 Hidden Hostile Human Tyrant Structures Map

description: This map contains locations of heavily fortified BL9 human tyrant structures. Castlelan Castle along with Militarized Island which are incredibly large. Beginner to Intermediate difficulty. Contains a lot of currencies to trade with Strange Merchant along with materials to craft BL9 ammo

use_action.message: You carefully examine the map and spot the entrances of Castlelan Castle along with Militarized Island hopefully

name.str: BL9 Hidden Hostile Alien Structures Map

description: This map contains locations of heavily fortified various alien structures. Infested Facility along with Guard Towers with Biomes underneath them along with Mobile 'Alliance' Base which contain lots of hostile aliens that are armed. Intermediate to Expert difficulty. Contains a lot of rare gear that even Strange Merchant does not sell along with materials to craft BL9 ammo

use_action.message: You carefully examine the map and spot the entrances of various alien structures hopefully
